title: I.Sicily inscription 000328
support: No details of the stone are recorded, other than its fragmentary state.

date._: Probably later second or early third century CE, due to presence of name T. Aelius

provenanceFound._: Unearthed along with many other fragments in 'area Stesichori' (i.e. the general area of the amphitheatre on the north side of the city centre) in 1740 according to Amico

provenanceObserved._: Seen by Mommsen, in museo Biscari

provenanceLost._: Not seen since Mommsen and assumed to be lost.
